timeline.bodyText:
I believe this would be better as
since that would make it well-formed.
timeline.author: jzheaux

timeline.bodyText: To adhere to the Baeldung style guide, let's please have this be a 2-space indent. Or it can go onto the previous line.
timeline.author: jzheaux

timeline.bodyText: It seems odd that these all aren't inside of a <body> tag.
timeline.author: jzheaux

timeline.bodyText: Thsse empty <body> and <head> tags seem odd. Let's remember to clean this up before merging.

replies.author: marius-munteanu

timeline.bodyText: For consistency with the Baeldung style guide, please call these methods "when..._then..." with a lowercase "t" instead of an uppercase "T".
timeline.author: jzheaux

timeline.bodyText: I'll go ahead and add this once it's published - let's remove this from the PR.
